modName: Noldorian Huntress - a re-texture of the Demon Hunter Armor
summary: Noldorian Huntress provides a new, unique and highly detailed variant of the popular Demon Hunter Armor by jmenaru. This is a lore-friendly sexy but not skimpy light female armour set in three colour variants - blue, red and emerald.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NX3FLl.jpg[/IMG]

About the Mod

Noldorian Huntress provides a new, unique and highly detailed variant of the popular Demon Hunter Armor by jmenaru. This is a lore-friendly sexy but not skimpy light female armour set in three colour variants - Fingolfin Edition ( blue ), Feanor Edition ( red ) and Finarfin Edition ( emerald ).

About the looks of it images can say more than thousand words of mine - especially since I had the honour to be able to get some of the greatest screenarchers on the Nexus as beta testers for my work. Be sure to check out their remarkable work in the gallery on this front page and in the image section of this mod.

Statwise it is lore friendly, strong but not overpowered and fully temperable and enchantable.


Required mods

As a re-texture project my Noldorian Huntress requires the original Demon Hunter Armor by jmenaru to provide the necessary meshes and game implementation. You can find it [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27060/]here[/url].


Installation

1. Install jmenarus [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27060/]Demon Hunter Armor[/url]. Installation notes can be found on his mod page.

2. Download ONE of the Noldorian Huntress variants and extract the file into your skyrim directory, e.g. C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData and say "yes" when being asked to integrate and override.


Un- installation

Please refer to the un-installation notes for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27060/]Demon Hunter Armor[/url].

Credits

Credits go to...

- jmenaru for being awesome and giving me the permission to do this retexture
of the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27060/]Demon Hunter Armor[/url].
- Bethesda for creating the gaming masterpiece Skyrim
- Professor Tolkien who made a fact-loving lawyer and historician believe in magic again, the day I discovered his unique and ever outstanding work back in 2001
- Peter Jackson and WETA Workshop for being a great inspiration for this mod
- Lana del Rey, Howard Shore, Harry Gregson-Williams, Richard Wagner, Giacomo Puccini and others for helping me through endless hours of learning how to do a decent texturing work

and last but absolutely not least to my fantastic group of beta testers :

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3421798]bassbil[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1784046]netherwalk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/351527]TomAraya[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/905814]Rosendaemonin[/url]


The gallery on this front page is a tribute to YOU and your contribution, your friendly help and encouragement and as well to your inspiring and outstanding screenarchery work. THANK YOU SO MUCH!


Permissions

You are not allowed to use any assets of this mod whithout my permission.


Gallery

Now, after so much reading you really deserve the visual joyride provided by my wonderful Beta testers. Be sure to check out their other work here on the Nexus ( links to their work can be found in the "Credits" section. Enjoy it!

Author's note :

If you like this mod please take a second to endorse and leave a comment or load up a picture - I will really apprechiate it, since I have put many hours of work and a lot of determination into it. If you face any issues please let me know, so that we may find a solution together.
author: EcthelionOtW
